elements.text:
DOING HOBBIES AND OTHER ACTIVITIES

Over the past week, have you usually had trouble doing your hobbies or other things that you like to do?

buttons: 1::1: Slight: I am a bit slow but do these activities easily.
2::2: Mild: I have some difficulty doing these activities.
3::3: Moderate: I have major problems doing these activities, but still do most.
4::4: Severe: I am unable to do most or all of these activities.
